title: Plaque, "Commemorative Plaque with Bust of Lenin", 1970
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular disk of bisque porcelain with bust of lenin in relief and inscription (in Ukranian?) "In honor of the 100th anniversary of the birth of Lenin;" enclosed in square frame with red enameled and gilded trim

tombstone.epitaph:
Plaque, "Commemorative Plaque with Bust of Lenin", 1970.
1970. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-253.
